CustomField.formula: if(LEN(Shipping_Street__c)>0, Shipping_Street__c& " " , "" ) & BR() & if(LEN(Shipping_City__c)>0, " " &Shipping_City__c& " " , "" ) & if(LEN(Shipping_State_Province__c)>0, " " & Shipping_State_Province__c& " " , "" )& if(LEN(Shipping_Zip_Postal_Code__c)>0, " " & Shipping_Zip_Postal_Code__c & " "," ") & BR() & If(LEN( Shipping_Country__c ) >0," " & Shipping_Country__c ,"")
CustomField.label: Shipping Address
